Thanks. I used to play this game 5 years ago.

For those having trouble installing the game, this is what I did without mounting the ISO files etc...

1. Extract all 3 ISO files to folders with 7zip (or whatever other program you use)

2. Open up the CD2 folder and copy all the files to the CD1 folder. You can also grab more files from the CD3 folder.

3. Now just run the setup

4. When installed, copy the crack file into " C:/Program Files/UnrealTournament/System

5. Now play
THIS IS THE RIGHT ONE TUPIK!!
Infected files. I wouldn't download this if I were you... should've known with such a low seed count.

OH, I get it...just found the virus in the "music" file of this torrent...explains the sound problems....other than that it runs great....just make sure to find that virus and kill it....remember not to open any of those music file by mistake, you'll regret it.

I don't know if anybody knows but there is a free online game called Tribes:Ascend.It is similar to Unreal tournament and Quake , it is very dinamic everyone is equipped with a jetpack and jet boots that allow you to "ski".It is a lot of fun, here is a link for those who want to try it out : https://account.hirezstudios.com/tribesascend/?referral=1263875&utm_campaign=email
